TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SqlCacheDependencyDatabase extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class SqlCacheDependencyDatabase Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 为 ASP.NET 应用程序配置 SQL 缓存依赖项数据库。

span.span: Configures the SQL cache dependencies databases for an ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许您以编程方式访问和修改`databases`的元素`sqlCacheDependency`中的节点`caching`配置节。The allows you to programmatically access and modify the `databases` element of the `sqlCacheDependency` node within the `caching` configuration section. SQL 缓存依赖项允许缓存的数据与原始源进行同步。The SQL cache dependency allows the cached data to be synchronized with the original source. 配置 ASP.NET 应用程序的缓存和特定 SQL Server 数据库表的实例中存储的项之间的关系之后类监视可能发生的更改的表。After you configure the relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's cache and a specific SQL Server database table, an instance of the class monitors the table for possible changes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取从现有的 Web 应用程序的配置文件的对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/CS/sqlcachedependencydatabase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/VB/sqlcachedependencydatabase.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置数据库的连接名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the connection name for the database.

value.span: 一个字符串，用于指定 配置节内的数据库连接字符串的名称。

span.span: A string that specifies the name of a database connection string within the configuration section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您以编程方式访问和修改`connectionName`的属性`add`元素的`databases`配置文件中的节点。The property allows you to programmatically access and modify the `connectionName` attribute of an `add` element of the `databases` node in a configuration file. 连接名称标识中的某个元素`connectionStrings`部分包含的数据库连接字符串。The connection name identifies an element in the `connectionStrings` section which contains the database connection string. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您以编程方式访问和修改`name`的属性`add`元素的`databases`配置文件中的节点。The property allows you to programmatically access and modify the `name` attribute of an `add` element of the `databases` node in a configuration file. `name`属性标识用于其中的表的数据库。The `name` attribute identifies the database whose table is used for the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property int PollTime { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.PollTime : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 轮询数据库表更改情况的频率。

span.span: Gets or sets the frequency with which the polls the database table for changes.

value.span: 数据库轮询时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The database polling time, in milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您以编程方式访问和修改`pollTime`的属性`add`元素的`databases`配置文件中的节点。The property allows you to programmatically access and modify the `pollTime` attribute of an `add` element of the `databases` node in a configuration file. 配置 ASP.NET 应用程序的缓存和特定 SQL Server 数据库表的实例中存储的项之间的关系之后类监视表，因此这些用户中的表更改的项，该项时，自动在中更新或从缓存中删除。After you configure the relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's cache and a specific SQL Server database table, an instance of the class monitors the table so that when an item in the table changes, the item is automatically updated in or removed from the cache. 在指定的频率监视进行。The monitoring happens at the frequency specified by the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/CS/sqlcachedependencydatabase.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase/VB/sqlcachedependencydatabase.vb#2)]
